## Overview

This session introduces the basics of metadata and specialized spatial metadata standards. We will also explore how to write READMEs for both data and project documentation.

## Key Objectives

-   Review examples of READMEs for data sets and projects
-   Practice working with data dictionaries and the [{labelled} package](https://larmarange.github.io/labelled/).
